offTurnMovementBlocked.GM: {token} cannot move - it is not their turn. Press "{hotkey}" while moving to move anyway.
offTurnMovementBlocked.player: {token} cannot move - it is not their turn.

debug.label: Debug Mode
debug.hint: Leave this disabled unless specifically asked to enable it by Illandril (otherwise, it will slow things down).

blockGMOffTurnMovement.label: Block GM Off-Turn Movement
blockGMOffTurnMovement.hint: Prevent GMs from moving tokens while a combat encounter is active unless it is the token's turn. GMs can temporarily override this setting by pressing the Allow Off-Turn Movement key (defaults to M, configurable in Controls).

blockPlayerOffTurnMovement.label: Block Player Off-Turn Movement
blockPlayerOffTurnMovement.hint: Prevent Players from moving tokens while a combat encounter is active unless it is the token's turn.

allowMovement.label: Allow Off-Turn Movement
allowMovement.hint: When pressed, a GM will be allowed to move a token when it is not that token's turn even if Block GM Off-Turn Movement is enabled.
